prompts: Create a sun-themed Pokemon with a bright orange body and radiant yellow spikes.
I want a cosmic Pokemon resembling a sun, featuring glowing eyes and sharp, star-like points.
Generate a rock-type Pokemon that looks like a sun, with a vibrant orange core and golden rays.
Make a mythical Pokemon that embodies light, with a circular shape and a fiery color palette.
Imagine a celestial Pokemon with a warm color scheme, sharp edges, and a glowing aura.
Design a legendary Pokemon that resembles a star, showcasing a mix of orange and yellow colors.
Show me a Pokemon that radiates energy, with distinct sun-like features and a cosmic appearance.
